name: ArchivedV
description: Tracking and Saving Unarchived Singing from Youtube Stream
readme_summary: ArchivedV is a JavaScript-based service designed to automatically download and save singing streams from YouTube, particularly those from Vtubers that might be unarchived due to copyright issues. It features keyword filtering, a web interface for management, and robust error handling for stream interruptions.
key_features: Automatic checking of subscribed channels for new live streams
Download matching videos based on specified keywords
Web interface for managing channels and keywords
Fail-safe auto-merger using ffmpeg for incomplete stream files
Support for members-only/private videos using cookies
primary_use_case: Archiving and saving unarchived singing streams from YouTube, especially Vtubers, to prevent content loss due to copyright or unarchiving practices.
cover_image_prompt: A diligent archivist, represented as a wise owl wearing a small headset, sits at a desk filled with digital scrolls and glowing data streams. The owl is actively capturing fragments of song lyrics and musical notes that are falling from a stylized, ethereal YouTube logo above. These captured elements are being neatly organized into a secure, glowing vault labeled 'ArchivedV'. Subtle UI elements showing download progress and keyword filters are visible on a nearby holographic screen. The scene is set in a cozy, dimly lit study with a warm, inviting glow, rendered in a 3D isometric illustration style with a focus on clear iconography and a vibrant, yet soft color palette.

name: dockmon
description: DockMon - Modern Docker container monitoring with auto-restart and alerts
readme_summary: DockMon is a comprehensive platform for monitoring and managing Docker containers. It offers real-time insights, intelligent auto-restart capabilities, multi-channel alerting, and detailed event logging for single or multiple Docker hosts.
primary_use_case: Monitoring and managing Docker containers across multiple hosts with features like auto-restart and alerts.
cover_image_prompt: A vigilant digital conductor orchestrating a symphony of interconnected Docker containers. The conductor, representing DockMon, uses a glowing baton to direct the flow of data and activity within each container, visualized as musical notes and energy streams. Some containers are shown with a subtle green aura indicating health, while others might have a faint red alert symbol. Small, transparent screens float around, displaying real-time CPU/memory graphs and log snippets. The background is a clean, futuristic control room with subtle network lines connecting the containers. The overall mood is one of calm control and efficiency. The style should be a 3D isometric illustration with vibrant, glowing elements and clear, distinct container icons.

name: HunyuanVideo-Avatar
readme_summary: HunyuanVideo-Avatar is a multimodal diffusion transformer model designed for generating high-fidelity, audio-driven human animations. It excels at creating dynamic videos with consistent characters, precise emotion alignment, and supports multi-character dialogue animation.
key_features: Audio Emotion Module (AEM) for fine-grained emotion control
Single GPU inference with low VRAM (10GB)
primary_use_case: Generating realistic and emotionally expressive multi-character animated videos from audio input, with strong character consistency.
cover_image_prompt: A digital conductor standing on a stage, with a microphone in one hand and a glowing baton in the other. From the microphone, sound waves emanate and are shaped by the baton into distinct, animated human avatars that are performing a synchronized dance. Each avatar clearly reflects the emotion and nuances of the audio. Subtle UI elements showing audio waveforms and character parameters are visible on floating screens around the conductor. The scene is set in a futuristic, minimalist theater with dramatic spotlighting. The overall style is a 3D isometric illustration with vibrant, glowing effects and a clean, modern aesthetic, emphasizing the transformation of sound into dynamic visual performance.

name: assayo
description: Creates an HTML-report with analysis of commit statistics
readme_summary: Assayo is a tool that generates an HTML report analyzing Git commit statistics. It provides insights into work pace, overtime, team dynamics, developer locations, release schedules, and project costs, offering a comprehensive overview of project development and team performance.
key_features: Analysis of work pace and overtime hours
Identification of responsibility zones, features, and bugs
Tracking employee turnover and team composition
Visualizing release schedules and vacation calendars
Identifying areas for refactoring and deleted files
primary_use_case: To provide detailed, visualized analysis of Git commit history for project management and team performance evaluation.
cover_image_prompt: A 3D isometric illustration of a bustling medieval workshop where skilled artisans are meticulously crafting intricate clockwork mechanisms. One artisan, representing 'Assayo', is using a magical magnifying glass to examine blueprints (Git commits) and a ledger (commit statistics). The magnifying glass highlights different aspects of the work: gears representing features, broken springs for bugs, and a calendar showing scheduled maintenance (releases). Small digital particles representing data flow around the scene, and a subtle 'Assayo' logo is etched onto the workshop wall. The overall mood is one of diligent analysis and insightful discovery, with warm, focused lighting.

name: bentopdf
readme_summary: BentoPDF is a self-hostable, client-side JavaScript PDF toolkit designed for privacy. It allows users to manipulate, edit, merge, and process PDF files directly in the browser without requiring any server-side interaction, ensuring data security and user privacy.
primary_use_case: Providing a secure, private, and self-hostable solution for client-side PDF manipulation and editing within a web browser.
cover_image_prompt: A digital artisan carefully assembling a complex, multi-layered Bento box using individual PDF pages as the ingredients. Each page is transparent, showing its content, and the artisan is using glowing digital tools to precisely arrange, merge, and slice them within the box. The background is a clean, minimalist workspace with subtle code elements and UI previews of the BentoPDF interface. The overall mood is one of precision, security, and creative control over digital documents. The art style should be a vibrant, 3D isometric illustration with clear iconography and a focus on the detailed, transparent layers of the PDF pages within the Bento box.
